info.description:
This API will return different datasets related to Organization Profit Centers

The base endpoint URL for this API in production is: `https://marko.aramark.net/v1/organization/profit_center`.

For testing the API with the "Try" tool on this page or in your app, use either our testing server "qa-marko" or our development server "dev-marko".
info.title: Profit Centers

200.description: Provides the Main Profit Center Attributes

get.description:
Returns Financial Profit Center attributes

![This endpoint is in development](/themes/portal/images/statuspngs/statusdev.png)

200.description: Provides the Financial Profit Center Attributes

apiKey.name: apikey
apiKey.description: This HTTP Header variable will verify permissions.

orgValueParam.name: org_value
orgValueParam.description: Aramark Organization code.  This must correspond to same level of the top_node

sizeParam.name: size
sizeParam.description: Number of records to be returned in each page of result set

bypassCacheParam.name: bypass-cache
bypassCacheParam.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache.

smokeParam.name: smoke
smokeParam.description: When set to 'true' this HTTP header variable will route the API call to the Integration testing environment. Only applicable in QA.

status.description: Indicator to determine if the Profit Center is Active or not

org_type.description: Level of the Organization in the Hierarchy

country.description: Country where the Profit Center is located

public_name.description: Public Name of the Profit Center

legacy_value.description: Legacy Number assigned to the Profit Center

open_date.description: Calendar Date when the Profit Center was officially opened

on_site_date.description: Calendar Date when Aramark was on site at the Profit Center

operational_close_date.description: Calendar Date when Aramark was last responsible for operating the Profit Center

close_date.description: Calendar Date when the Profit Center was officially closed

line_of_service_code.description: Code of Line of Service assigned to Profit Center

line_of_service.description: Description of the line of service assigned to the Profit Center.  A line of service represents the major services Aramark provides

default_service_type_code.description: Code of the Default Service Type of the Profit Center

default_service_type.description: Description of the Default Service Type assigned to the Profit Center.  A service type respresents an Aramark operating model within a broader line of service

contract_type_code.description: Code of the Contract Type for the Profit Center

contract_type.description: Description of the Contract Type for the Profit Center.  A Contract Type represents the type of contractual agreement Aramark has with the client

org_type.description: Level of the Organization in the Hierarchy

status.description: Indicator to determine if the Profit Center is Active or not

type.description: Description of the type of address

address.description: Full address for the Profit Center, associated to the address type

address_status.description: Flag to determine if the address is Active or not

attention_to.description: Address details such as Department, Job Title, etc.

address_line_2.description: Address details such as PO Box, Building, etc.

address_line_3.description: Address details such as Floor, Suite, etc.

longitude.description: Longitude value of the Location in degrees

latitude.description: Latitude value of the Location in degrees

org_type.description: Level of the Organization in the Hierarchy

status.description: Indicator to determine if the Profit Center is Active or not

payroll_legal_entity_code.description: Code of the Payroll Legal Entity

payroll_legal_entity.description: Description of the Payroll Legal Entity

plm_pc_code.description: Code of the parent, reclass Profit Center to which the PLM account of a child Profit Center offsets

plm_pc.description: Name of the parent, reclass Profit Center to which the PLM account of a child Profit Center offsets

payroll_unique_id.description: Unique Indentifier for payroll. P = Puerto Rico, X = None, E = Executive, A = Arrears, O = Other

payroll_frequency_hourly.description: The frequency for hourly employees with which payroll is processed at the specified Profit Center

weekend_day_hourly_code.description: The week ending day number for hourly employees

weekend_day_hourly.description: The week ending day name for hourly employees

pay_day_hourly_code.description: The day nmber of the week for the pay day for hourly employees

pay_day_hourly.description: The day name of the week for the pay day for hourly employees

paygroup_hourly_code.description: Code composed of the coutry, payroll unique id, payroll frequency, week end day, pay day values for hourly employees

payroll_frequency_salaried.description: The frequency for salaried employees with which payroll is processed at the specified Profit Center

weekend_day_salaried_code.description: The week ending day number for salaried employees

weekend_day_salaried.description: The week ending day name for salaried employees

pay_day_salaried_code.description: The day number of the week for the pay day for salaried employees

pay_day_salaried.description: The day name of the week for the pay day for salaried employees

paygroup_salaried_code.description: Code compoased of the country, payroll unique id, payroll frequency, week end day, pay day values for salaried employees

payroll_org_value.description: Organization Value for the payroll system

org_type.description: Level of the Organization in the Hierarchy

status.description: Indicator to determine if the Profit Center is Active or not

name.description: First and Last name of the contact person for the Profit Center

responsible.description: Email and Name of the contact person for the Profit Center

contact_status.description: Indicator to determine if the contact is active or not

business_phone.description: Business Phone number of the contact person

cell_phone.description: Cell Phone number of the contact person

org_type.description: Level of the Organization in the Hierarchy

status.description: Indicator to determine if the Profit Center is Active or not

market_segment.description: Market Segmentation of the Profit Center

incentive_survey.description: Flag to indicate if the Profit Center participages in the Incentive Survey

industry_sector.description: Description of the Industry Sector for the Profit Center

org_type.description: Level of the Organization in the Hierarchy

status.description: Indicator to determine if the Profit Center is Active or not

sub_market_code.description: Code for Sub Market for the Profit Center

sub_market.description: Description of Sub Market for the Profit Center

segmentation_code.description: Code for the Segmentation for the Profit Center

segmentation.description: Description of the Segmentation for the Profit Center

sector_code.description: Code for the Sector for the Profit Center

sector.description: Description of the Sector for the Profit Center

fc_interest_eligible_code.description: Code for the Interest Eligible flag

fc_interest_eligible.description: Descirption for the Interest Elibile flag.  This marks whther the Profit Center participates in Finance charge billing

fc_collection_method_code.description: Code for the Finance Charge Collection Method

fc_collection_method.description: Description of the method in which the Finance Charge is collected

fc_start_days.description: The number of days added to an Accounts Receivable invoice date to produce the start date for Finance Charge calculations

legal_entity_code.description: Code of the Legal Entity assigned to the Profit Center

legal_entity.description: Description of the Legal Entity assigned to the Profit Center.  A Legal Entity is a corporation, comprised of a group Profit Centers, which has a charter granting it certain legal powers

reporting_legal_entity_code.description: Code of the Reporting Legal Entity assigned to the Profit Center

reporting_legal_entity.description: Descirption of the Reporting Legal Entity assigned to the Profit Center

cbs_pc_type_code.description: Code for the Profit Center Type assigned to the Profit Center

cbs_pc_type.description: Desciption for the Profit Center Type assigned to the Profit Center.  The Type of Profit Center as is reconciled within Calculation Billing

cbs_recycle_code.description: Fiscal Month number for the Recycle Period assigned to the Profit Center

cbs_recycle.description: Fiscal Month name for the Recycle Period assigned to the Profit Center.  The Fiscal Period that client P&L accounts recycle for the Profit Center

biweekly_accrual_flag.description: Flag to indicate if the Profit Center is D61 BiWeekly

chart_code.description: Code of the Chart of Accounts assigned to the Profit Center

chart.description: Description of the Chart of Accounts assigned to the Profit Center.  The Chart represents the account segments detail that provide the framework for tracking, summarizing, and reporting business operations and results

service_type_code.description: Code for the Default Service Type assigned to the Profit Center

service_type.description: Desciption for the Default Service Type assigned to that Profit Center.  A service type represents an Aramark operating model within a broader line of service

line_of_service_code.description: Code of Line of Service assigned to Profit Center

line_of_service.description: Description of the line of service assigned to the Profit Center.  A line of service represents the major services Aramark provides

default_service_type_code.description: Code of the Default Service Type of the Profit Center

default_service_type.description: Description of the Default Service Type assigned to the Profit Center.  A service type respresents an Aramark operating model within a broader line of service

contract_type_code.description: Code of the Contract Type for the Profit Center

contract_type.description: Description of the Contract Type for the Profit Center.  A Contract Type represents the type of contractual agreement Aramark has with the client

workstation_code.description: Code for the Workstation assigned to the Profit Center

workstation.description: Description for the Workstation assigned to the Profit Center.  A Workstation represents the accountant responsible for the monthly reconciliation of the Profit Center
